item.description:
Our next meetup is at 729 Hope St. Join us for coffee, pastry, a wide-ranging, informal discussion of anything related to programming with PHP, or all three.

This time, we'll probably share some of the projects we're working on, so bring some screenshots or a quick demo if you'd like. (If this starts to run long, we can always go into more depth next month.)

The restaurant closes at 8 PM, so it's a good idea to get there by 7 PM if you want to get some food without having to tear yourself away from the conversation.
item.name: Providence PHP Meetup March Meetup
